review: Relaxed experienced friendly and very supportive. She was so encouraging during my dressing which is quite complicated, I never experienced this kind of pain. So her motivation was much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Alka Kumar is a rare phenomenon and people like her come once in a Lifetime...A positive, humble and a wonderful human being...The routine check up and her motherly guidance kept us going all the way up to our D-Day. Dr Alka has an amazing network and is well recognised...Highly recommended.
We wish you all the success Doc and may you find everything that you looking for... cheers
Amazing amazing doctor. Very caring, motherly and very motivating. Doctors like her are rare to find!
